name: Trickee Ogre
description:
My submission for the first Fennel Game Jam!

In Trickee Ogre, you are playing a simple trick taking game against an Ogre who doesn't like to lose.

The deck used has the four standard suits with cards ranging from 1 to 7. Hands are 11 cards. The leading suit is the trump suit for that round, and the highest value in the trump suit wins. If you have a card matching the leading suit, you must play it.

Use the mouse to start the game and to select cards.

This is my first game jam, my first TIC-80 game, my first completed game, and my second piece of software written in fennel. I had a lot of fun making it, and I hope it brings you some enjoyment as well! :)

If you want to know more about me, I keep a personal website at micklemeal.space.
